title: PM-KISAN
description: Income support scheme providing ₹6000 per year to farmer families.
documents_required: Aadhaar card, land records, bank details.
application_process: Apply through PM-KISAN portal or CSC.

title: PM Fasal Bima Yojana
description: Crop insurance scheme for farmers against natural calamities.

title: PM Scholarship Scheme
description: Scholarships for children of armed forces personnel.
eligibility: Children of ex-servicemen with minimum 60% marks.

title: Ayushman Bharat – PM-JAY
description: Health insurance coverage up to ₹5 lakh per family.
application_process: Generate Ayushman card online or at hospital.
